Detailed Description

cvmx_lmc::_nxm_fadr

This register captures only the first transaction with a NXM error while an interrupt is pending, and only captures a subsequent event once the interrupt is cleared by writing a 1 to LMC()_INT[NXM_ERR]. It captures the actual L2C-LMC address provided to the LMC that caused the NXM error. A read or write NXM error is captured only if enabled using the NXM event enables.
